song.title: Sex in the Library
song.info:
This is finally a non-80s dance track of mine. I took the liberty of using plenty modern synthesizers and effects.
Practically the whole melodic composition was done on a single day, with another day or two of polishing and fine-tuning.
I spiced the mix a bit with a selection of fine female moans and sighs for added pleasure; hence the title
I've had just too much fun doing this.
October 5 of 2011
